text: George Lincoln Rockwell (March 9, 1918 â€“ August 25, 1967) was an American politician and neo-Nazi. He founded the American Nazi Party. He was born in Bloomington, Illinois. Rockwell denied The Holocaust and believed that Martin Luther King Jr. was a tool for Jewish Communists wanting to rule the white community. He blamed the civil rights movement on the Jews. == Books == Rockwell wrote the book This Time The World in 1961 And White power in 1967. These books will give you a lot more insight into his life for those researching him. This time the world partains more so to his life and white power to his politics. == Assassination == On August 25, 1967, Rockwell was assassinated in Arlington by John Patler at the age of 49. ==References== Category:1918 births Category:1967 deaths Category:Assassinated American politicians Category:American crime victims Category:Neo-Nazis Category:American political activists Category:Military people from Illinois Category:Politicians from Illinois Category:People from Bloomington, Illinois
title: George Lincoln Rockwell
